EMAIL.INVALID: Email must be a valid email address
EMAIL.MAX_LENGTH: Email must be no longer than {maxLength} characters

DISPLAY_NAME.STRING: Display name must be a string
DISPLAY_NAME.MAX_LENGTH: Display name must be no longer than {maxLength} characters

USERNAME.MAX_LENGTH: Username must be no longer than {maxLength} characters

PASSWORD.STRONG: Password must have at least {minLength} characters, {minNumbers} number, {minSymbols} symbol and {minUppercase} uppercase letter
PASSWORD.MAX_LENGTH: Password must be no longer than {maxLength} characters

TITLE.MAX_LENGTH: Title must be no longer than {maxLength} characters

CONTENT.MAX_LENGTH: Content must be no longer than {maxLength} characters

AUTHOR.MAX_LENGTH: Author must be no longer than {maxLength} characters

RATING.MAX_LENGTH: Rating must be no longer than {maxLength} characters
